Uses of Package
uno.network.server

  • Packages that use uno.network.server 
    Package Description
    uno.network  
    uno.network.server  
    uno.server.core  
  • Classes in uno.network.server used by uno.network 
    Class and Description
    NetworkServer
    The network handler for the server side

    Accepts connections from clients and saves them in separate threads
    Takes a max amount of players, if it's full new players are ignored and receives a message that it's full
    Handles all the connects and disconnects and if it's an expected disconnect or not
    Uses a listener for the events that happens
  • Classes in uno.network.server used by uno.network.server 
    Class and Description
    NetworkServer
    The network handler for the server side

    Accepts connections from clients and saves them in separate threads
    Takes a max amount of players, if it's full new players are ignored and receives a message that it's full
    Handles all the connects and disconnects and if it's an expected disconnect or not
    Uses a listener for the events that happens
    PlayerThread
    The thread responsible for communications between a client and the server
